name: A Thread Through Reality
description:
The Fabric of Reality has been torn!

When a mysterious fractal creature invades her peaceful evening, Susan the Seamstress has no choice but to go on an adventure to save her reality before all time periods mix with each other, and reality collapses altogether.

Join Susan on her journey and travel into the distant past and the far future to sort out the ridiculous chaos wrought by the Tears in the Fabric of Reality in this comedic short-story adventure game.

Featuring:

  • Casual, stress-free gameplay!
  • Absurd humor!
  • Colorful hand-drawn art!
  • Fully animated, expressive characters!
  • An original orchestral soundtrack!
  • Cinematic cutscenes!
  • An estimated playtime of 2-3 hours!

And all of this completely for FREE!

Download below!
